game.name: Duolty
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Duolty is a mystery, exploration and puzzle game developed by a single person. Dive into a strange world and befriend its curious inhabitants. Will you discover who you really are before it’s too late?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Duolty is a mystery, exploration and puzzle game developed by a single person. Dive into a strange world and befriend its curious inhabitants. Will you discover who you really are before it’s too late?
